property.name: packageid
property.description: Id of the package

property.name: packageguid
property.description: GUID of the package

property.name: packagename
property.description: Full name of the package, example: libacl-devel

property.name: packagetitle
property.description: Short name of the package, example: anki the cool game

property.name: packagefilename
property.description: Full name of the package, example: libacl-devel-2.2.49-12.1.armv7l.rpm

property.name: packageversion
property.description: Version number of the package, example: 2.2.49

property.name: packagedescription
property.description: Long description of the package

property.name: packagedownloadurl
property.description: Direct download URL for the package

property.name: packageinstallfileurl
property.description: Direct download URL for the ymp file to install all required repositories and fulfill dependencies

property.name: packagecategory
property.description: Id of the category the package belongs to

property.name: packagecategoryname
property.description: Name of the category the package belongs to, example: Daemons

property.name: repoid
property.description: Id of the repository the package belongs to

property.name: reponame
property.description: Name for the repository, example: meego_1.1_extras_handset

property.name: repotitle
property.description: Pretty name for the repository, example: meego_1.1_extras_handset (for armv7el)

property.name: repoarch
property.description: Architecture the repository is built for, example: armv7el

property.name: repoos
property.description: Name of the OS the repository is made for, example: meego

property.name: repoosversion
property.description: Version of the OS the repository is made for, example: 1.0

property.name: repoosgroup
property.description: Name of the group the repository belongs to within the OS, example: core

property.name: repoosux
property.description: Name of the user experience the repository belongs to within the group, example: netbook

property.name: repoproject
property.description: Id of the project the repository belongs to

property.name: repoprojectname
property.description: Name of the project the repository belongs to, example: home:fal

property.name: repoprojecttitle
property.description: Pretty name of the project the repository belongs to, example: fal's Home Project

property.name: repodisabledownload
property.description: Flag to indicate if the repository is downloadable or not
